Articles.Content:
Salutations.

Apologies for filling up the challenge thread recently.

Your mission, should you choose to accept it:

OBJECTIVE: Design a realistic-looking (could be anything from American Army to Nazi) propaganda poster advertising R.K.M.

REWARD: Building me a sweet avatar, and severe thanks, or if you can figure something reasonable out We need to spread propaganda of our army; new forces arise! All propaganda accepted, the one that contributes the most to spreading it gets the above award.

DEADLINE: Zero-hundred hours on the fifteenth day of the first month of the twelfth year of the first decade of the first century of the second millennium

Godspeed!

Say, do you mind if we collaborate? I have some pretty sweet planes but terrible artistic skills.

We could promote the most awesome crafts with the expertise of someone with a real drawing capability.

NONONONONONO

I\'m good at DESIGNING stuff, but HORRENDOUS at arts and crafts.

Hell, I got a c+ in the Arts on a straight A report card.

I was adressing the community.

I was adressing the community.

OK...

It\'s kind of an odd place to put it...
In that case, I will be more that happy to work with someone else with exceptional art ability.
Thought I\'d revive this thread and add my contribution:

I had a quick try, the results were not too bad.

Since when was \'Make my avatar\' a reward?. Sure, you can get away with a competition for a little artwork, but the reward is another job! Hah, I don\'t mean to be rude, but I think you should get of your lazy ass and make your own!

Since when was \'Make my avatar\' a reward?. Sure, you can get away with a competition for a little artwork, but the reward is another job! Hah, I don\'t mean to be rude, but I think you should get of your lazy ass and make your own!

Perhaps that came out wrong. There are other possible rewards as well.

Hey! Everything you see in my sig was hand-made!

That\'s good! Maybe a little more green, or even detail?

Our colours are green and red/orange.
Just did it for fun.

Just did it for fun.

For a second, I though that was the Lion King logo.

BTW, that doesn\'t make any sense.

If you\'ve ever read The Kraken Wakes by John Windham, you\'d get the referance.

The US Navy decides to atom bomb an area of deep water where the cruiser Keeweenaw went down, because, as you find out, there\'s an alien sea-monster smashing up ships with high-tech weapons. The main character, who is supposed to be writing the story, discusses this with his wife. He gets a little frustrated, and says 'Let\'s drop atom bombs for the moment. No, that\'s not what I meant. Forget atom bombs.'

Ok, thanks.

I never said I would

I though you were suggesting I was pressuring you to use it by posting it here in the first place.

Well that solves it then.

Great. Would you mind deleting all these posts, up to 'you don\'t have to use it, it\'s there if you want it'?

Thanks.
well, heres my attempt, its pretty bad Tbh

Could be Improved, but here is my take.. i have a few other ideas for posters.

Edit: The E in awesome.. in the attachments.. the big one does not want to update.. photobucket... ???

-snip-

Could be Improved, but here is my take.. i have a few other ideas for posters.

AWESOME!

Please, make the others.

Only improvement:

Awesome
heres a second try;

heres a second try;

-snip-

Umm, OK...

well.. they can\'t all be quantum engineers.. or they could, do you want it down?

Edit, made it a little bit more agressive, but your right.. the setting doesnt have any.. motion, its not dynamic..

well.. they can\'t all be quantum engineers.. or they could, do you want it down?

No, no, it\'s fine.

My only critique is that it\'s not very expressive.

THE KOLD WAR IS OVER!

The R.K.M wins 36-14!

Thanks to 707-Engineering for making this awesome Soviet-style (I think) poster!

Why posters...

...if you can just broadcast it to everyone via satellite? 8)
This seems to work for me
